subject: Football
Television
lead_paragraph: Tony Kornheiser fit in well in his “Monday Night Football” debut. He didn’t sound scripted, and he never appeared so eager to get his air time that he trampled on Joe Theismann’s.
snippet: Tony Kornheiser fit in well in his “Monday Night Football” debut. He didn’t sound scripted, and he never appeared so eager to get his air time that he trampled on Joe Theismann’s.
